sentences.sContent: Mongolia really is the land of opportunity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mongolia really is the land of opportunity.
sentences.sCn: 蒙古是名副其实的机会之地。

sentences.sContent: Mongolia should begin uranium mining in about 2013, he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mongolia should begin uranium mining in about 2013, he said.
sentences.sCn: 他并称,蒙古应该能在2013年前后开始开采铀矿.

phrases.pCn: 外蒙古（原为中国领土的一部分，后独立成立蒙古人民共和国）
